<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Circlet of Persuasion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=400)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=10" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 603 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 15,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn circlet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This elegant silver band often resembles curling fig leaves and fits around your brow. You gain a +2 item bonus to Deception and Diplomacy checks. When you invest the circlet, you either increase your Charisma score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever would give you a higher score.
